sentences.sContent: Gerald was 38, and a confirmed bachelor (=  a man who has decided that he will never marry  ) .
sentences.sCn: 杰拉德38岁，抱定主意独身。

sentences.sContent: The Crown Prince was Japan’s most eligible bachelor (=  a rich young man who has not yet married  ) .
sentences.sCn: 皇太子是日本最理想的适婚男子。
文学士/理学士/教育学士等

phrases.pCn: 学士学位；大学本科学位证书
（美）单身汉舞会（尤指婚礼前夕为新郎举行的）

words.tran: 学士学位；对毕业班的致辞

trans.tranOther: a man who has never been married
